page.title: 14ROSSINGTON HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: Rossington Health Centre is in McConnel Crescent. It is open 5\ days a week, 9am-11am and 4.30pm-6pm on weekdays and 9am-11am on Saturdays. To see the doctor you inform the receptionist on arrival at the centre. No appointment is needed. The doctors will make home visits. There are five doctors. The clinic is open to anyone who is registered there. Prescriptions are free to anyone under 18 years old and over retiring age, otherwise the cost is Â£2.00 per item. Twenty four hours notice is needed for a repeat prescription. The clinic has doctors, health visitors and district nurses. There is a baby clinic on two afternoons and an ante-natal clinic. District nurses and health visitors give tests and injections to old and young people.
